title: Bunnie's Dad Bill Spills All About Raising Bunnie
itunes:title: Bunnie's Dad Bill Spills All About Raising Bunnie
description:
It took him three years to come on the show, but Bunnie's dad Bill is finally here and ready to tell all! Bill talks about what it was like raising Bunnie as a single dad, if she really was a trouble maker, and a few life lessons he's learned along the way about parenting. Bill also shares how he gets his youthful glow and sweet haircut. 

"We taught you to drink at an early age." - Bill
